title: Tom Brady, Patriots, Buccaneers, and Cam Newton
itunes:title: Tom Brady, Patriots, Buccaneers, and Cam Newton
description:
Colin discusses Tom Brady's choice to sign with the Buccaneers, the Patriots moving forward, the latest NFL trades and rumors, and why nobody seems to be interested in Cam Newton. Guests include Nick Wright, Jay Glazer, Rich Ohrnberger, Chris Simms, and Todd Fuhrman.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
